ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Don Heck,Carmine Infantino,Howard Sherman,John Calnan,Jerry Grandenetti
ComicInfo.Title: This Little Witch Went to College; Fingers of Fear!; The Second Life of Simon Steele; The Corpse Who Carried Cash!; The Man in the Cellar
ComicInfo.Summary:
This Little Witch Went to College: A coven sends Claire to stop Frederick Stokes from investigating a death that will lead him straight to the witches.
Fingers of Fear!: Albert Tisdale kills the other members of his expedition, but then their faces begin to appear on his fingers and try to take their revenge.
The Second Life of Simon Steele: The ghost of a lawyer who relied on sorcery returns after 150 years to take revenge on the descendant of the person who stopped him originally.
The Corpse Who Carried Cash!: Otis embezzles money from the funeral home he works at and hides it temporarily in a coffin until he can retrieve it later.
The Man in the Cellar: Ephraim Dark meets a kind stranger who offers him a meal but Ephraim can only think he's being spied on so the stranger can steal his money.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
